feed.title: Blockchain torrent on SourceForge d/l area?

entry.title: Blockchain torrent on SourceForge d/l area?
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik, from exMULTI, Inc., is seeking permission to upload bootstrap.dat.torrent to sourceforge.net/projects/bitcoin/files/Bitcoin/blockchain/. He asks if there are any objections to this proposal.
